a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Equality of political power across social groups index
Based on the expert estimates and index by V-Dem, weighted by countries' populations. It captures the extent
to which social groups — defined by language, ethnicity, religion, race, region, and/or caste — are irrelevant to
politics, or have similar political power. Higher scores mean more equality.
